channel.title: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?
channel.description: i want to add a store that can buy anything into my zenithscape server (the one that laake released) and i cant figure out how :/ any help would be appreciated

item.title: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?
item.dc:creator: @soapeater3 soapeater3
item.description:
@soapeater3 wrote:

[quote=“308507631, post:4, topic:454882”][quote author=CPUsquad link=topic=557747.msg4080734#msg4080734 date=1345340201]
add a general shop… go to unpackedshops… make shop line set as (true)… and ur done dont forget to delete packedshops file
[/quote] There are like 3 packedshops files please can you specify which exactly? Thanks man.[/quote]

Same

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?

item.title: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?

item.title: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?
item.dc:creator: @Rene_eats_waffl3z Rene eats waffl3z
item.description:
@Rene_eats_waffl3z wrote:

Just set the value on true fo rthe line, and then make sure to repack it.

item.title: How do you add a store that buys anything to ZenithScape?
item.dc:creator: @CPUsquad CPUsquad
item.description:
@CPUsquad wrote:

add a general shop… go to unpackedshops… make shop line set as (true)… and ur done dont forget to delete packedshops file
